dɛ: fa w'enyi si Seir bepɔw do
, #Isa 34.5-17; 63.1-6; Jer 49.7-22; Eze: na hyɛ nkɔm gu no do
column7: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column10: na mebɛtsen me nsa wɔ wo do
column11: na mayɛ wo amamfo na ahobowdze."

dɛ: na ɔwo ebɛyɛ amamfo; na ibohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

"EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ bio: "Osiandɛ ewɔ daa enyitan na eyi Israelmba ahyɛ afona no n'ahoɔdzen nsa wɔ hɔn mbusu ber mu
dɛ: wɔ hɔn ewiei emumuyɛ ne ber no ntsi:"

column6: na bɔgya etsiw wo: susuampa dɛ ɔwo ennkyir bɔgya no

"EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ bio: "Mbrɛ mubodua ayɛ bepɔw Seir ahobowdze na amamfo nye no; na mubotwa nyia ɔresen na nyia ɔresan no efi mu."
"Na medze n'atɔfoe bɛhyɛ ne mbepɔw do amaama: wo nkoko do na wo mbɔnsa mu na w'esuka nyina mu na hɔn a wɔatotɔ afona ano nyina no bogugu."

dɛ: na wo nkurow no wɔrenntsena do: na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

, #Isa 34.5-17; 63.1-6; Jer 49.7-22; Eze: na nkurow nkurow ebien yi bɛyɛ medze
12; Oba 1-14; Mal 1.2-5": na yɛafa edzi do; ber a nna EWURADZE wɔ hɔ:"
mebɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ w'ebufuw no tse
column6: na dɛ mbrɛ w'enyitan a akyerɛ no wɔ kyir a edze kyir hɔn no mu no tse; na mebɛma woehu me wɔ hɔn mu
column7: ber a mubobu wo atsɛn no."

"EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ bio: "Na ibohu dɛ emi EWURADZE matse wo kasabɔn a akasa etsiatsia Israel mbepɔw no dɛ
"Na hom dze hom ano edzi mo do ekokrokosɛm
dɛ: na hom ama hom nsɛm adɔɔ so etsia me: matse."

"EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ bio: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ber a asaase nyina bedzi ehurusi no
"Dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo idzii Israel fifo egyapadze eduwa
, #Isa 34.5-17; 63.1-6; Jer 49.7-22; Eze: dɛmara na medze bɛyɛ wo: Seir bepɔw
column6: na Edom nyina no mu nyina mpo: na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."
